text: Terry and June is a British sitcom that was shown on BBC One from 1979 until 1987. It stars Terry Scott and June Whitfield as Terry and June Medford, a middle class, middle aged, married couple who live in Purley, London. == Other websites == * Category:1979 television series debuts Category:1987 television series endings Category:1970s British sitcoms Category:1980s British sitcoms Category:BBC television sitcoms Category:Television series about marriage Category:Television series about suburbia Category:Television series set in London Category:English-language television programs Category:1987 disestablishments in the United Kingdom
title: Terry and June
